alert.note: Alert for Central Somerset; Northern Franklin; Northern Oxford (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 23 at 9:29AM EST until January 23 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...WIDESPREAD MODERATE TO HEAVY SNOWFALL CONTINUES THROUGH THIS EVENING... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations between 2 and 4 inches for a storm total of 4 to 6 inches. North to northwest winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Portions of west central and western Maine. Portions of northern New Hampshire. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...An area of low pressure will bring a period of snowfall to the region. Travel will be impacted due to snowfall accumulations on roads. Periods of moderate to locally heavy snow will combine with low visibility to create dangerous driving conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the Monday evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by going to newengland511.org

area.areaDesc: Central Somerset; Northern Franklin; Northern Oxford
